snippet: A study of constitutions in 188 countries adopted from 1946 to 2006 found that only some of the most popular rights are shared by the United States Constitution.
lead_paragraph: A study of constitutions in 188 countries adopted from 1946 to 2006 found that only some of the most popular rights are shared by the United States Constitution.

headline.seo: The U.S. Constitution: A Less Common Model
headline.main: The U.S. Constitution: A Less Common Model
